name: dugout
content:
dugout noun [C]
(SHELTER)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a shelter, usually for soldiers, made by digging a hole in the ground and covering it
a shelter for the members of a team at the side of a sports field
ToddKuhns/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

dugout noun [C]
(BOAT)
(also dugout canoe) a small light boat made by cutting out the middle of a tree trunk
pierivb/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
